name: dpm-lol
title: dpm.lol
description: Easily search and access data on dpm.lol.
author: azizouichni

commands.name: search
commands.title: Search Summoner
commands.description: Quickly search any summoner and open their stats on dpm.lol.

commands.name: build
commands.title: Champion Builds
commands.description: Find the latest builds for any champion on dpm.lol.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
